title: Emotionally Scarred
description: Emma has been bullied her whole life. Her supernatural ability to sense other peopleâ€™s emotions makes their cruel words even more painful. When Emma changes schools she hopes things will be different, but a prank and a risky plan turn into a life or death situation. Emma will discover she has more power than she thought, but will she use it for good?
author: Selina Fenech
